page.title: 06 THE LEIGH 4
page.content: There is still no gas or main drainage so people use septic tanks or cesspits and a few use bottled gas for cooking. {HOUSING} Most people who live in The Leigh commute to work in Gloucester or Cheltenham. The oldest houses are black and white half timber,some with thatched roofs. The most modern houses date from the 1930's and 2 council houses built for farm workers. There have been very few new buildings since the Second World War because permission is very difficult to obtain in the Green Belt. Most houses and cottages have been modernised.
